title: Signal CEO成功反hack各國政府用嚟hack人手機嘅Cellebrite

replies.msg:
https://signal.org/blog/cellebrite-vulnerabilities/

TL;DR:
1. Cellebrite嘅軟件本身好多漏洞，e.g. 用嚟讀取多媒體檔案嘅ffmpeg係2012版，咁多年冇更新過，累積咗過百個安全漏洞。（呢個只係眾多漏洞之一）
2. 被國安偷取嘅電話只要有app裡面有一個檔案可以運用呢啲漏洞，就可以全面控制Cellebrite搵到嘅資料（提供0資料，或甚至提供假資料，或甚至反hack，由Cellebrite部機偷返國安之前偷過嘅電話資料），Moxie喺文中示範咗係work嘅。
3. 因為Cellebrite嘅漏洞實在太勁，只要破解過一次，往後同一部機都唔會可靠，因為Cellebrite軟件嘅運作已經被改寫。
即是
可唔可以hack埋d垃圾賭場廣告牙
嘩好耐無見 安全就好

另外文中提及Signal將會定時下載一啲「有藝術價值」嘅檔案。
應該就係用嚟自動反hack Cellebrite嘅檔案。

push

For example, by including a specially formatted but otherwise innocuous file in an app on a device that is then scanned by Cellebrite, it’s possible to execute code that modifies not just the Cellebrite report being created in that scan, but also all previous and future generated Cellebrite reports from all previously scanned devices and all future scanned devices in any arbitrary way (inserting or removing text, email, photos, contacts, files, or any other data), with no detectable timestamp changes or checksum failures. This could even be done at random, and would seriously call the data integrity of Cellebrite’s reports into question.

replies.msg:
我諗你誤會咗.
It seems unlikely to us that Apple has granted Cellebrite a license to redistribute and incorporate Apple DLLs in its own product, so this might present a legal risk for Cellebrite and its users.

篇文係話Cellebrite套software中包含咗有Apple signed DLL files. 正常黎講Apple冇理由會license比Cellebrite bundle黎distribute佢地signture DLL files(暗示Cellebrite私自bundle侵犯Apple copyright).

正常如果要depends on 3rd-party(this case, Cellebrite depends on Apple), 係要叫使用者自己另外install,等user知道裝咗3rd-party software. (e.g. 舊時d game要求你有directx,佢會pop directx installer or 叫你裝左先).

依家Cellebrite私自bundle Apple d DLL,即係佢本身就係盜版軟件. 而Cellebrite使用者就係盜版軟件使用者,Apple可以告Cellebrite同佢D使用者盜用Apple software(i.e. the "legal risk")

quote.msg: 可唔可以hack埋d垃圾賭場廣告牙

whatsapp api 有 limitation 唔比你大量 mass message
嚴重嘅好似會 ban
正如佢本身個 broadcast function 都要人地有 save 你 contact 先會收到

但 signal 相對 whatsapp 未有咁多 anti spam 嘅 mechanism
比啲時間佢，我相信有日會好過 tg
TG 贏速度同方便，Signal 贏 security
